name: Peter the Great
what_did:
Peter the Great worked hard to make Russia more modern.
He traveled to Europe to learn about ships, cities, and science.
He built a new capital city, St. Petersburg, to connect Russia with the West.
why_matters:
Peter helped turn Russia into a strong and modern country.
He encouraged learning, building, and exploring new ideas.
He showed that leaders could change their whole country by learning from others.

questions.q: Why did Peter travel to Europe?
What did Peter want for Russia?
What kind of leader was Peter?
options: One who liked learning and building

fun_fact: Peter the Great once worked undercover in a shipyard to learn how to build boats!
